item.title: IDEANOMICS INC 10-K
item.description: IDEANOMICS INC, which is in the Motor Vehicles & Passenger Car Bodies [3711] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 02, 2022 had 64267 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1306 instances million - 822 instances 31 - 647 instances december - 632 instances 2021 - 604 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
